Text:
I assume the english subtitles are hardcoded, yes?

Thanks for this, Manic88
Thanks, Manic88. But, one note for non-english speaking people: english subtitle is flattened completely (part of video) so you can't switch to yours alone.
Rwww. Probably Credits have been cut out
Decent file. Yes, the subtitles are hard coded. Thanks Manic88.

Hard coded is fine as long as the subtitle is ripped consistent with the audio and its meaning.
Thanks a bunch Manic!
